long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embed educational content into your kids online experience.
Play 2 learn is a smart digital agent, which can assist you as a parent to monitor your child online experience and embeds educational content into your child experience.
As a parent you can influence and guide which educational content your child would be promoted with, as well as track their progress.
